headline: Cencora Announces Common Share Repurchase From Walgreens Boots Alliance
summary: CONSHOHOCKEN, Pa., February 07, 2025--Cencora, Inc. (NYSE: COR) today announced that it has agreed to repurchase shares of its common stock from Walgreens Boots Alliance Holdings LLC in the amount of approximately $50 million in concurrence with Walgreens Boots Alliance’s sale of Cencora shares pursuant to Rule 144 under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.
